question:
Consider the following:
1. Kaziranga National Park
2. Manas Wildlife Sanctuary & Tiger Reserve
3. Sundarbans National Park
Which among the above are World Heritage Sites?
explanation: The Natural properties of India in World Heritage List are: Kaziranga National Park (1985), Keoladeo National Park (1985), Manas Wildlife Sanctuary (1985), Nanda Devi and Valley of Flowers National Parks (1988) and Sundarbans National Park (1987).
